member.name: M:EventService.Controllers.EventsController.GetEventTicketInfo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This API returns the count of available tickets based on the provided event and ticket type

member.name: M:EventService.Controllers.EventsController.ReduceCapacity(EventService.DTOs.TicketReductionDto)
member.summary: This API is not used here; the ticket quantity will be reduced by the Ticket Service when a ticket is purchased
